data.name: MAGNET
data.description: Pulls items within an 8 block radius towards you

data.name: PLAGUE
data.description: Poisoned mobs spread their poison to nearby mobs

data.name: HAWKEYE
data.description: Arrow storm fires 5 arrows each dealing 80% damage

data.name: GREED
data.description: Picking up emeralds heals you and nearby players for 15% max health

data.name: CAVALRYMAN
data.description: You may cast spells and attack with a 70% damage penalty while on a horse

data.name: GUARDIAN
data.description: 50% of the damage taken by nearby allies is redirected to you

data.name: HERO
data.description: While under 50% maximum health, nearby allies gain 50% bonus damage and defense

data.name: ALTRUISM
data.description: Nearby players gain 35% of the health you naturally regenerate

data.name: ARCANES
data.description: 50% chance for spells to cost no mana when casted

data.name: ENTROPY
data.description: Meteor falls three times faster

data.name: ROVINGASSASSIN
data.description: Vanish no longer drains mana while invisible

data.name: MADNESS
data.description: Cast a random ability every 3 seconds

data.name: LIGHTWEIGHT
data.description: You no longer take fall damage

data.name: SORCERY
data.description: 30% chance for spells and attacks to cast a second time at no additional cost

data.name: TAUNT
data.description: Mobs within 12 blocks target you upon casting War Scream

data.name: RALLY
data.description: Charge heals you by 10% and nearby allies by 15% on impact, but becomes harmless

data.name: CHERRY_BOMBS
data.description: Your Smoke Bombs explodes instantly on contact, dealing 110% damage each

data.name: FREERUNNER
data.description: Double your sprint speed when your sprint bar is under 30%

data.name: PEACEFUL_EFFIGY
data.description: Your totem will last twice as long

data.name: FURIOUS_EFFIGY
data.description: Totem effects are twice as fast, but duration is halved

data.name: FLASHFREEZE
data.description: Ice Snake is instant but has a reduced range

data.name: FISSION
data.description: Explosions from your "Exploding" ID are twice as big and twice as strong

data.name: EXPLOSIVE_IMPACT
data.description: Your "Exploding" ID can trigger when hitting mobs with your basic attack

data.name: GEOCENTRISM
data.description: Aura radiates from you instead of your Totem and can be cast any time
